title: Animation (SCP-008)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

While fighting off a zombie horde, two clone recruits must make a terrible decision when the unthinkable happens.

This is the third episode of my SCP animated sketch comedy series Rookies, featuring [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-008 SCP-008].
